<h3 id="X31429">X(31429) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, HALF-MOSES, SPIEKER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3+(b+c)*a^2-(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a-(b+c)^3)  :  :
<p>X(31429) lies on these lines:
{1,5021}, {3,16517}, {6,31424}, {8,31426}, {9,39}, {10,7738}, {21,16780}, {37,3333}, {40,1107}, {57,5283}, {200,31448}, {516,31405}, {517,31468}, {574,5438}, {936,5013}, {958,9593}, {960,9592}, {968,1475}, {975,5030}, {1329,31428}, {1376,31421}, {1378,31427}, {1500,6762}, {1571,1573}, {1697,16975}, {1699,31466}, {1703,31464}, {2082,4414}, {2136,31433}, {2275,31435}, {2551,31396}, {3158,31451}, {3452,31400}, {3646,16604}, {4652,5276}, {5024,5044}, {5254,5705}, {5275,15803}, {5286,5745}, {5437,16589}, {5791,15048}, {6421,31438}, {6765,31477}, {7736,12572}, {9575,12514}, {9589,31469}, {9607,31446}, {9619,15829}, {9620,31456}, {9623,31490}, {9709,31430}, {9711,31431}, {12527,31402}, {17448,31393}, {24627,27523}</p>
<p>
X(31429) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (39, 31442, 9), (1571, 1573, 1706)<br>
